name: guardian-voice-generation
description: Generate Guardian hypnosis scripts using Google Cloud TTS or ElevenLabs

scripts.test:google: echo 'Testing Google Cloud TTS connection...' && node -e "const tts = require('@google-cloud/text-to-speech'); const client = new tts.TextToSpeechClient(); console.log('✅ Google Cloud TTS client initialized successfully');"
scripts.test:elevenlabs: echo 'Testing ElevenLabs API connection...' && node -e "if (!process.env.ELEVENLABS_API_KEY) { console.error('❌ ELEVENLABS_API_KEY not set'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ ElevenLabs API key found'); }"

author: Guardian App
